SqExcel

Excel Add-in for Seeq Data Integration and Analysis

What is SqExcel?

SqExcel is a powerful Microsoft Excel add-in that seamlessly integrates with Seeq, enabling you to access, analyze, and visualize your industrial data directly within Excel. Whether you're working with time-series data, performing statistical analysis, or creating reports, SqExcel brings the power of Seeq's advanced analytics to your familiar Excel environment.

üîó Direct Seeq Integration

Connect directly to your Seeq server and access your data sources, workbooks, and analyses without leaving Excel.

üìä Advanced Analytics

Leverage Seeq's powerful time-series analysis capabilities including statistical functions, signal processing, and trend analysis.

üìà Custom Functions

Use custom Excel functions to pull Seeq data, perform calculations, and create dynamic reports that update automatically.

üéØ Easy to Use

Intuitive task pane interface that makes it easy to browse Seeq content and insert data into your Excel worksheets.

How to Install SqExcel

Follow these steps to sideload the SqExcel add-in in your version of Excel:

ü™ü Windows Excel (Excel 2016 or later)

  1. Open Excel and create a new workbook
  2. Go to Insert tab ‚Üí My Add-ins ‚Üí Upload My Add-in
  3. Click Browse and select the downloaded manifest file
  4. Click Upload to install the add-in
  5. The SqExcel add-in will appear in your Home tab

üçé Mac Excel (Excel 2016 or later)

  1. Open Excel and create a new workbook
  2. Go to Insert tab ‚Üí Add-ins ‚Üí My Add-ins
  3. Click the Upload My Add-in button
  4. Select the downloaded manifest file and click Upload
  5. The SqExcel add-in will be available in your Home tab

üåê Excel Online (Office 365)

  1. Open Excel Online in your browser
  2. Go to Insert tab ‚Üí Office Add-ins
  3. Click Upload My Add-in
  4. Upload the manifest file
  5. Start using SqExcel in your online workbook

Get Started

Download the manifest file and start using SqExcel today!
